mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM,book.bookreport_title bookreport_title, book.bookreport_content bookreport_content,book.star star, customer.user_name user_name FROM bookreport book Inner JOIN customer_info customer ON book.user_email = customer.user_email where ROWNUM<3 and product_no= #{product_no}

SELECT pl.product_name product_name, it.order_cnt order_cnt, it.total_price total_price, li.payment_date payment_date, li.order_no order_no, li.delivery_info delivery_info FROM order_list li, order_items it, product_list pl WHERE li.order_no = it.order_no and it.product_no = pl.product_no and li.USER_EMAIL = #{user_email} and li.delivery_info !='배송완료'
